idea: We, SIDDHARTH PRAMOD SHAH, SHALINI CHATURVEDI and JALPA AMIT JANI Directors of the Company "ACARA WELLNESS PRIVATE LIMITED".The Company is incorporated on 17th January, 2018 at Maharashtra under Companies Act, 2013. Company is doing business of consulting, Medical services; hygienic and beauty care for  human beings.Currently, Company has setup Skin Clinic at Delhi and operating above mentioned services under the name and style of "Klarity Skin Clinic".Our business is lie on  combination of strong medical knowledge and expertise with latest state of art technology to offer innovative and effective skin and hair care in a hygienic and state of art clinic. We take pride in the fact that all our services are performed by out expert team of doctors or our highly trained therapists under strict supervision of the doctors.
name: ACARA WELLNESS PRIVATE LIMITED
